('主题：让单马局', [{'message': '<td class="inforight" valign="top" style="line-height:120%"><b style="font-size:12px;line-height:15px;">让单马局</b>&#13;\n<br /><br />&#13;\n&#13;\n&#13;\n<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td>&#13;\n<div id="textstyle_1" style="word-wrap:break-word;word-break:break-all;overflow:hidden;font-size:12pt;text-indent:6px;">&#13;\n\t&#13;\n\t<p><will_be_deleted>[DhtmlXQiFrame] [DhtmlXQ_ver]www_ichinachess_com[/DhtmlXQ_ver] [DhtmlXQ_init]520,450[/DhtmlXQ_init] [DhtmlXQ_movelist][/DhtmlXQ_movelist] [DhtmlXQ_binit]8979695949392919097717866646260600102030405060708012720323436383[/DhtmlXQ_binit] [DhtmlXQ_title]让单马 第三局 当头炮直车对单提马-红先(红让左马)[/DhtmlXQ_title] [DhtmlXQ_type]全局[/DhtmlXQ_type] [DhtmlXQ_result]红胜[/DhtmlXQ_result] [DhtmlXQ_comment0]《弈林新编》杨官璘编著||[/DhtmlXQ_comment0] [DhtmlXQ_comment11]注：如图局势，黑方如走车1平4，则车九平八，炮平1，马四进三，炮8平7，马三进一去马，炮7进7去相，车二平三去炮，象7进9去马，车八迸七，黑无便宜。||[/DhtmlXQ_comment11] [DhtmlXQ_comment20]黑方仍多一马，黑方便宜。||[/DhtmlXQ_comment20] [DhtmlXQ_comment30]黑无便宜。||[/DhtmlXQ_comment30] [DhtmlXQ_refer]www.lshh.net[/DhtmlXQ_refer] [/DhtmlXQiFrame]</will_be_deleted></p><p>红左马应该没有！</p>&#13;\n\t<div align="right"><font color="#000066">[此贴子已经被作者于2008-8-1 14:07:07编辑过]</font></div>&#13;\n&#13;\n\t&#13;\n</div>&#13;\n</td></tr></table>&#13;\n<br /></td>&#13;\n', 'time': '2008-8-1 14:05:00', 'author': 'gdj818'}])
